channel.title: 554 starting server
channel.description:
ok well heres my problem ive had this with every single 508+ server ive tryed i dont know how to run them every time i click run it says "the system cannot find the path specified" so i click on edit and it says my java is in the "program files" but my java is really at the "program files (x86)" so it just keeps doing this ive tryed making paths from the computer settings place but it dose not work at all if anyone can help me id like to get this server up and runing
also i had to download the cache file but i dont know where to put it if you do reply please tell me everything i need to do in detail i also have teamviewer so it may just be easier by doing that so i can watch and learn thanks

item.title: 554 starting server
item.dc:creator: @Nick_is_the_god Nick is the god
item.description:
@Nick_is_the_god wrote:

ok well heres my problem ive had this with every single 508+ server ive tryed i dont know how to run them every time i click run it says “the system cannot find the path specified” so i click on edit and it says my java is in the “program files”
but my java is really at the “program files (x86)” so it just keeps doing this ive tryed making paths from the computer settings place but it dose not work at all if anyone can help me id like to get this server up and runing

also i had to download the cache file but i dont know where to put it
if you do reply please tell me everything i need to do in detail
i also have teamviewer so it may just be easier by doing that so i can watch and learn
thanks
